column1: * 1946 - J.R.R. Tolkien writes Letter to Przemyslaw Mroczkowski (2 August 1946).
* 1966 - J.R.R. Tolkien is interviewed by William Cater.
* 1968 - J.R.R. Tolkien writes Letter to Robert Havard.
* 1981 - The twenty-second episode of the The Lord of the Rings (1981 radio series) of The Lord of the Rings is aired on BBC.
* 2004 - Mythcon 35 at wikipedia:University of Michigan in wikipedia:Ann Arbor
